summary.para: Defines the security algorithms and key lengths to be used with WS-Security. This setting is relevant to message security bindings and mixed-mode security bindings.

remarks.para: When key derivation is used, the key length restrictions apply to the source security token from which the signing or encryption derived token are derived.

summary.para: Algorithm to use for XML canonicalization, such as the exclusive XML canonicalization algorithm. Setting this value to will default to WS_SECURITY_ALGORITHM_CANONICALIZATION_EXCLUSIVE.
Algorithm to use for message part digests, such as SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-384, or SHA-512. Setting this value to will default to WS_SECURITY_ALGORITHM_DIGEST_SHA1.

Algorithm to use for message authentication codes (also known as MACs or symmetric signatures) such as HMAC-SHA1, HMAC-SHA256, HMAC-SHA384, or HMAC-SHA512. Setting this value to will default to WS_SECURITY_ALGORITHM_SYMMETRIC_SIGNATURE_HMAC_SHA1.
Algorithm to use for asymmetric signatures. Setting this value to will default to WS_SECURITY_ALGORITHM_ASYMMETRIC_SIGNATURE_RSA_SHA1.
Algorithm to use for message part encryption. Reserved for future use. Should be set to .
Algorithm to use for deriving keys from other symmetric keys. Setting this value to will default to WS_SECURITY_ALGORITHM_KEY_DERIVATION_P_SHA1.
Algorithm to use for encrypting symmetric keys with other symmetric keys. Reserved for future use. Should be set to .
Algorithm to use for encrypting symmetric keys with asymmetric keys. Setting this value to will default to WS_SECURITY_ALGORITHM_ASYMMETRIC_KEYWRAP_RSA_OAEP.
The minimum key length (in bits) of symmetric key security tokens. Setting this value to 0 will default to 128 bits.
The maximum key length (in bits) of symmetric key security tokens. Setting this value to 0 will default to 512 bits.
The minimum key length (in bits) of asymmetric key security tokens. Setting this value to 0 will default to 1024 bits.
The maximum key length (in bits) of asymmetric key security tokens. Setting this value to 0 will default to 16384 bits.
Algorithm properties. Reserved for future use. Should be set to NULL.
Number of entries in properties array. Reserved for future use. Should be set to 0.
